title: Daniele De Rossi
summary: Daniele De Rossi Ufficiale OMRI[3][4] (Italian pronunciation: [daˈnjɛːle de ˈrossi]; born 24 July 1983) is an Italian former professional footballer who played as a defensive midfielder and is currently an assistant coach of the Italy national football team. He is mostly known for his time playing with his hometown club Roma in Serie A, as well as a former FIFA World Cup-winning Italy national team player.
